0011000000000000 ;0 : 3  0  Read n to acc
0010000000110110 ;2 : 2  54 Store n from acc
0110000000101110 ;4 : 6  46 acc = acc(n) - 2
1011000000011010 ;6 : 11 26 if acc(n-2) < 0, jump to (11010)(26)
1010000000100000 ;8 : 10 32 if acc(n-2) = 0, jump to (100000)(32)
0001000000110110 ;10: 1  54 Load n to acc
0111000000110100 ;12: 7  52 acc = acc(n) * 6
0101000000110010 ;14: 5  50 acc = acc(6n)+5
0010000000111000 ;16: 2  56 Store 6n+5 from acc
0001000000110110 ;18: 1  54 Load n to acc
0111000000110110 ;20: 7  54 acc = acc(n)*n
0101000000111000 ;22: 5  56 acc = acc(n*n) + (6n+5)
1001000000101010 ;24: 9  42 Jump to write
0001000000110110 ;26: 1  54 Load n to acc
0111000000110110 ;28: 7  54 acc = acc(n)*n
1001000000101010 ;30: 9  42 Jump to write
0001000000110110 ;32: 1  54 Load n to acc
0111000000110000 ;34: 7  48 acc = acc(n) * 4
0010000000111010 ;36: 2  58 Store 4n from acc
0001000000110110 ;38: 1  54 Load n to acc
0110000000111010 ;40: 6  58 acc = acc(n)-4n
0100000000000000 ;42: 4  0  write
0000000000000000 ;44: 0  0  stop
0000000000000010 ;46: 0  2  Storage for Const 2
0000000000000100 ;48: 0  4  Storage for Const 4
0000000000000101 ;50: 0  5  Storage for Const 5
0000000000000110 ;52: 0  6  Storage for Const 6
0000000000000000 ;54: 0  0  Storage for n
0000000000000000 ;56: 0  0  Storage for 6n+5
0000000000000000 ;58: 0  0  Storage for 4n
